content: Willing to sell:Kialara "To the Moon" 100k bits #156/250 for 0.07 BTC + shippingKialara "Exogenesis" 2,000,000 sats #154/250 for 0.05 BTC + shipping0.10 BTC for both and shipping is on me. (Preferred - meaning if you offer to buy just one, I might prefer another offer to buy both even if it came later.)Both un-funded.Both bought here from minerjones.Escrow optional, on your expense.Both in plastic cases made by Kialara.Exogenesis in mint condition, but since To the Moon was originally sold only in a plastic bag, it has very minor surface abrasions.Prices are non-negotiable, sorry.Long term offer, might bump occasionally.PMs please.
